title: HDFC ERGO General Insurance Company Limited
sample_text:
Policy Wordings
Comprehensive Project Insurance - Variant 5
This policy of insurance is made between
1.	
the insuring party
2.	
the insurer
The insuring party has submitted to the insurer a proposal 
requesting insurance cover to be provided under one or 
more sections of this policy of insurance and the proposal has 
been accepted by the insurer. The insurance cover provided 
by this policy of insurance is only in respect of and subject 
to the wording of those sections to which the schedule has 
been completed and which have been signed and dated by 
the insurer.
Subject to the insuring part

title: TERRORISM DAMAGE EXCLUSION WARRANTY
deductible: means the amount to be deducted from any
sample_text:
This Policy excludes loss, damage, cost or expense of 
whatsoever nature directly or indirectly caused by, resulting 
from or in connection with any act of terrorism regardless of 
any other cause or event contributing concurrently or in any 
other sequence to the loss.
For the purpose of this exclusion, an act of terrorism means 
an act or series of acts, including but not limited to the use of 
force or violence and/or the threat thereof, of any person or 
group(s) of persons, whether acting alone or on behalf of or 
in connection with any organisation(s) or government(s), or 
unlawful assoc
